title: Cave Diver
description: A procedurally generated cave exploration game, implemented using agents, cellular automata, simplex noise and marching cubes. Comes with real-time cave destruction and map update, and also a combat system with bat enemy AI.

title: Math Lab
description: A mathematics educational application. Implemented using Unity, with NodeJS and MongoDB as backend. It provides a real-time interactive system to simulate online learning experience using gamification. Biligual UI is used to improve accessibility.

title: Behind You
description: A 2.5D story game. Developed during Global Game Jam 2021 with other jammers.

title: Dungeon Adventure
description: A 2D roguelike mobile game, includes a turn-based combat system. Collaborated with another game developer.

title: The Dungeon
description: A dungeon exploration game. Featuring a dungeon generation algorithm with connected rooms of varying sizes. 3D character controller with combat animation is done.

title: BattleGirl 2D
description: Classic 2D arcade plane shooter published to Google Play. Developed with a team of game development enthusiast during my university year one, this projected marked the start of my game development journey.
